summary: This is an evidence chain of custody form for an item seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence, specifically a red rope containing a message book. The form documents the transfer of custody for this evidence item among various law enforcement personnel, indicating it was part of the 2006 investigation.

events.title: Evidence Collection from Epstein Residence
events.description: A red rope containing a message book was collected as evidence from Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach, FL residence.

keyFacts: Evidence item 31E-MM-108062, described as a 'REDROPE CONTAINING: (49) (36) ONE MESSAGE BOOK', was collected from Epstein's Palm Beach residence on August 28, 2006.
The evidence was initially held by the Miami field office (MM) and was stored at a Bronx warehouse under location E03707388 - ECR8.

The document is a chain of custody form (FD-1004) showing multiple handoffs of the evidence, though the signatures and printed names of the custodians are largely illegible or redacted in the provided text.
The evidence barcode is E6982852 and it is associated with Case # 31E-MM-108062.
The form indicates the evidence was part of the early investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, predating his 2008 plea deal.
